title: Advanced Grammar Guide
description: Deep dive into complex grammatical structures to refine your accuracy.
info:
Course Info

Master the rules that trip up even advanced learners. We look at mixed conditionals, nuanced modal verbs, and the strategic use of the passive voice.

quiz.question: Which sentence is a Mixed Conditional?

options.text: If I had studied, I would pass the test.
If I had studied, I would be happy now.
If I study, I will pass.

quiz.correctFeedback: Yes! It mixes a past condition ('If I had studied') with a present result ('I would be happy now').
quiz.incorrectFeedback: Look for a sentence that connects the past to the present.
